backend/main.mo: Stores contact form submissions in a list and provides methods to submit and retrieve them.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for build tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind and OKLCH-based theme variables plus dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document with SEO meta tags and root div loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring providers, navigation state, and layout including Navbar, pages, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactS: Contact form component with validation, submission handling, success state, and contact details UI.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer with quick links, smooth-scroll navigation, social icons, and branding elements.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Navbar: Responsive navbar enabling section scrolling, home/admin navigation, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an about section with company description and value cards using icons and styled layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays a hero banner with background image, headline, description, and buttons that scroll to contact or services sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/HowItWo: Shows a four-step explanation of the service process with numbered steps and icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/JobRequ: Lists job requirements for credit card sales roles in a grid of cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Presents three core services in card format with icons, descriptions, and an additional image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactSubmissions: Fetches all contact submissions from the backend using the actor once available.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentMeta.ts: Updates the document title and meta description on effect.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
Submits contact form data via the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with custom color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/validation/contactValid: Validates contact form fields for required values, minimum lengths, and email format.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
Fetches and displays contact form submissions with loading, error, empty, and list states using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage sections and sets SEO metadata for the Trustline Financial Services landing page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the site's design system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, requirements, and state version for build planning.
